text: Travel Insuren cover covid or not?

In German there test negative . But reach sg .. they test positive. Sg qurantine them .. they not happy . And keep argument out test kit got problem .. end up extended hotel . And the booked flights back to Germany have to cancel .. lose Chor
This not sure .. but . If cover sure expensive cos .. get covid19 in other country is high chance 😂
Problem is qurrantine at hotel or hospital .. if qurrantine at other countries hospital ... Wah . Cannot make it want leh 😂
Actually very high risk.. pay nvm..the problem can’t recover than siao
They is alot of unsure for all this
Yes .. I have a customer Went to Spain for business trip . Was forced by company during last year .
If kena this company paid..if personal holiday no joke..
When coming back time test positive at Spain airport .. then cannot fly can .. kanna send to their hospital qurantine ..
You so look forward to holiday in thailand? 😂
Oh ya.. can’t even sit in to plane
It not about paid .. when you at those racists country hospital .. see what they do to you .. especially you donno to speak their language .
Wor part is .. the doctor there any how inject my customer and give him pill to eat . Which cannot rejected .. lucky he came back in a piece . He told me it a night mare in their hospital
Cos .. we not sure about their health care system and how all had to be done .. cos we are Chinese at there . Abit dangerous .
My customer quit the job already . After second time the company ask him go Paris for business trip
If you are the boss .. maybe can choose
Cos now .. if happen to test positive before departure .. confirm cannot take plane Liao .. must extended Liao 😂
Oh my dog . You the best 😘
To anywhere man. I've not left house for 2 weeks now
If you at other countries ? Stay whose home ? 😂
My house is inside bedok reservoir
There a bro .. forgot what name .. he have 九天 he stay bedok
Lose Chor .. hotel plus extra flight
Win the counter not enough paid the bills 💵 🥶
